content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":10562,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/81324374-ef07-4504-b9ae-10e02fecc201/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/81324374-ef07-4504-b9ae-10e02fecc201/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"compensation.png\",\"name\":\"compensation.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"81324374-ef07-4504-b9ae-10e02fecc201\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1023,\"height\":90},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your salary is paid on the 15th day of every month if a business day is. The regular salary payment will be made on the last day of the month. If it’s a weekend, it’ll be made on the last business day of the month before the weekend.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find more information on the dedicated \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/COCompensation\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://policy.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"policy.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" > Compensation and Benefits.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please use the widget “Compensation package” in your Telescope profile to view the details of your compensation.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of any questions or issues, drop an email to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:wfaanywheresalary@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Salary\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Please note that the answer might require five business days.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
